Description: Unique identifier for each cow
Cow group classification (Fresh, Late Lactation, Dry, Heifer)
Number of days in milk or stage of lactation
Cow body condition score on a scale of 1 to 5
Health condition of the cow (e.g., Healthy, Mastitis, Lameness, Metabolic Disorder)
Indicates if the cow received treatment (Yes/No)
Daily intake of corn silage in kilograms
Daily intake of alfalfa in kilograms
Daily intake of soymeal in kilograms
Daily intake of minerals in kilograms
Daily feed cost per cow in USD
Daily milk yield in liters
Percentage of milk fat content
Percentage of milk protein content
Somatic cell count in milk (indicator of udder health)
Ambient temperature in Fahrenheit
Relative humidity percentage
Daily precipitation in millimeters
Soil moisture percentage
Daily veterinary cost per cow in USD
Daily fuel cost per cow in USD
Estimated nitrogen runoff in kilograms
Amount of feed wasted in kilograms
Ratio of feed consumed to milk yield
Indicator of cow health maintenance (binary or index)
Composite score representing sustainability performance
